programme.title: Live Betfred Super League
programme.desc: St Helens v Warrington Wolves (Kick-off 7.45pm). Coverage of the match from the 23rd round of fixtures, taking place at Totally Wicked Stadium. Following this round of matches the league will split into the Super 8s and The Qualifiers, and both of these sides are already guaranteed of a place in the top eight. These teams have only faced each other once this season, and St Helens triumphed 30-12 on that occasion.

programme.title: Live Vitality T20 Blast Cricket
programme.desc: Yorkshire Vikings v Birmingham Bears. Coverage of the North Division encounter in the T20 competition, taking place at Emerald Headingley Stadium. Of the two fixtures scheduled between these sides last season, the first saw the Vikings claim a 29-run victory at this ground, while the second was abandoned without a ball being bowled, but it was Bears who had the more successful campaign as they made it to the final.(n)

programme.title: Danska liga: Brondby - Vejle
programme.desc: Danska Superliga je najvišje kotirano ligaško nogometno tekmovanje na Danskem. Ustanovljena je bila leta 1991 pod okriljem Danske nogometne zveze. Je naslednica t.i. Danske prve lige. V njej nastopa 12 klubov. Najuspešnejši klub je FC Copenhagen, med zelo uspešne danske klube spadajo tudi Odense BK, AaB Aalborg in Brondby IF, naslov brani Midtjylland, ki je osvojil drugi naslov v klubski zgodovini.

programme.desc: From 2004: Miami at Los Angeles Lakers in Shaquille O'Neal and Kobe Bryant's first meeting as foes since Shaq's trade from L.A. Miami won 104-102 in OT behind O'Neal's 24 points and 11 rebounds. Bryant scored 42. (cc).

programme.title: Open Court

programme.title: Open Court
programme.desc: An in-depth look at some of the most iconic shots and clutch players in NBA playoff history--including a discussion about the most clutch playoff shot over the last 40 years. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Open Court
programme.desc: Dominique Wilkins, Isiah Thomas, Grant Hill, Chris Webber and Steve Smith discuss their favorite and most-feared signature moves, while looking ahead at the influence of current moves from Stephen Curry, James Harden and Kyrie Irving. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Open Court
programme.desc: Ernie Johnson hosts a wide-ranging roundtable discussion with Isiah Thomas, Chris Webber, Steve Smith and Dennis Scott. Topics include players' passion for championships; the pros and cons of AAU basketball; and stories from their playing days. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Open Court
programme.desc: The panel of NBA stars name their all-decade teams from the '60s, '70s, '80s, '90s and 2000's. Shaquille O'Neal, Isiah Thomas, Reggie Miller, Grant Hill, Brent Barry, Steve Smith and Dennis Scott are featured. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Open Court
programme.desc: Former NBA stars take to the hardwood to reveal secrets to their signature moves and demonstrate drills for young players. Included: Steve Smith, Reggie Miller, Grant Hill, Shaquille O'Neal, Isiah Thomas, Dennis Scott and Brent Barry. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Open Court
programme.desc: A panel of former players discusses the league's most memorable and complete teams that fell shy of winning the NBA championship. Chris Webber, Kevin McHale, Kenny Smith, Derek Fisher, Greg Anthony, Steve Smith and Dennis Scott are featured. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Open Court
programme.desc: Kevin McHale, Kenny Smith, Grant Hill and other former NBA players demonstrate basketball tips for key player positions in the modern NBA. The group shows how post play, spot-up shooting, point guard skills and versatility play roles on winning teams. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Open Court
programme.desc: Some of the NBA's brightest young stars including Boston's Jayson Tatum, Chicago's Lauri Markkanen, Philadelphia's Ben Simmons and Utah's Donovan Mitchell join host Matt Winer for a roundtable discussion. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Open Court
programme.desc: A glimpse into the family lives of Magic Johnson, Chris Paul, Shannon Brown and Chris Bosh, with Cookie Johnson, Jada Paul, Monica Brown and Adrienne Bosh sharing the many dynamics of their roles as wives, mothers, entrepreneurs and philanthropists. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Open Court
programme.desc: The wide-ranging cast of Jerry Colangelo, Wayne Embry, Rod Thorn, Isiah Thomas and Arn Tellem discuss their careers and their part in making the NBA what it is today. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Open Court
programme.desc: A star-studded cast takes us inside the best and worst moments of their career, including Isiah Thomas hitting a game-winning shot the same day his mother accepts his diploma at Indiana; Charles Barkley scoring 44 points in a deciding Game 7; and Shaquille O'Neal scoring a career high 61 points on his birthday. Dennis Scott, Kevin McHale and host Ernie Johnson also appear. (cc).(n)

programme.desc: When Craig says this cartridge introduction is the most significant advancement in ammo since paper cartridge cases changed to metallic cases people take notice. Rob Leatham tells us his connection to G&A as a kid.

programme.title: Wild Outdoors
programme.desc: Wyatt Gregory takes a page out of his dad's playbook and concentrates on one specific deer. With time running out in the season, he debates his strategy.

programme.title: Long Range Pursuit
programme.desc: Team Gunwerks hosts their first-ever National Rifle League Match in Cody, Wyo. at the Monster Lake Ranch. Many of the top competitors are there in hopes of bringing home some loot.

programme.title: Western Extreme
programme.desc: We travel to Africa.

programme.title: West of Texas
programme.desc: Stephen welcomes some very special guests from the opposite side of the world to hunt the Bar Fork Ranch. These travelers are new to whitetail hunting and are looking to bag their first-ever whitetail before returning home.

programme.title: Into High Country
programme.desc: Part 1. Jason Matzinger hunts giant bighorn sheep with a bow in his home state of Montana. Follow alongside Jason on the epic journey in pursuit of one of the most iconic game animals in North America in the premiere area in the world.

programme.title: The Western Hunter
programme.desc: Nate Simmons hits the backcountry of Nevada in search of mule deer. When it seems the area is a lost cause and Nate's about to head back to the drawing board, a challenging opportunity arises.

programme.title: Jim Shockey's Hunting Adventures *
programme.sub-title: I Will Cross The Frontier Of Civilization: Maasailand
programme.desc: Jim journeys to Tanzania with his long-time friend and professional hunter Mike Fell to go after some unique plains games species that live amongst the Maasai people.

programme.title: Jim Shockey's Hunting Adventures *
programme.desc: Jim recounts memories hunting with his family as he returns to the family ranch in Saskatchewan for the first time since his Dad passed away. Jim also targets an old non-typical 8x9 buck that he's had on Stealthcam for many years.

programme.title: Red Rising
programme.desc: Eric Hale is in Virginia hunting after bucks named Lefty and Johnny Appleseed. Both of these bucks give Eric a run for his money.

programme.title: Big Deer TV *
programme.desc: From base camp on the Oklahoma-Texas border, Mike & friends hunt rutting bucks in varied terrains.

programme.title: North American Whitetail Television
programme.desc: Stan Potts bowhunts Illinois and doubles down in Montana with his rifle; Dr. Deer considers whether missing a buck will ruin a hunting spot; and we'll talk real-world archery practice.

programme.title: Bowlife
programme.desc: Part 3. Levi and Samantha have both filled their deer tags and spend their last few days in Wyoming chasing antelope.

programme.title: Dominant Bucks *
programme.desc: Learn DIY bowhunting strategies from real hunters hunting wild dominant bucks. Massachusetts bowhunter Cory DeSousa and New Jersey bowhunter Chris Schmidt find, set up and arrow mature dominant bucks.

programme.desc: The crew dives into the big deer history of one of their Oklahoma ranches.

programme.title: Bowhunter TV
programme.desc: Bowhunters Brian Fortenbaugh and Jeff Waring hunt beefy whitetails in the foothills of Wyoming's Bighorn Mountains. Mike Carney shares his foodplotting insights.

programme.desc: With the rut soon to be underway, hunting over mock scrapes can be deadly. Learn as Kyle Wieter shares his techniques on the best locations for using the Scrape Fix System and then getting the intel to be successful through the use of trail cameras.

programme.desc: Stan Potts bowhunts Illinois and doubles down in Montana with his rifle; Dr. Deer considers whether missing a buck will ruin a hunting spot; and we'll talk real-world archery practice.

programme.title: Bowhunter TV
programme.desc: Bowhunters Brian Fortenbaugh and Jeff Waring hunt beefy whitetails in the foothills of Wyoming's Bighorn Mountains. Mike Carney shares his foodplotting insights.

programme.title: Adrenaline
programme.desc: With the rut soon to be underway, hunting over mock scrapes can be deadly. Learn as Kyle Wieter shares his techniques on the best locations for using the Scrape Fix System and then getting the intel to be successful through the use of trail cameras.

programme.title: Gun It With Benny Spies
programme.desc: Benny heads to Mitchell, S.D. for a Cabela's appearance. Later, he kicks off South Dakota's pheasant opener in Pierre.

programme.title: Backcountry Hunters TV
programme.desc: Hal Gahm and Todd McKinney team up with Joey Burns to hunt mule deer on one of the most unbelievable places in Colorado.

programme.title: Elk Camp
programme.desc: Steve Chappell guides long time client Junior Philpot on an elk hunt on their southwest Colorado private lands.

programme.title: Wildlifers
programme.desc: Texas country music artist Kevin Fowler joins the WildLifers on a hunt in New Mexico during elk season. Dan Braman arrives to camp just a couple days early and sets out to fill his tag.

programme.title: Petersen's Hunting Adventures
programme.desc: Mike Schoby initiates his young nephew into the world of the hunter as they pursue a big whitetail buck on Nebraska's windy plains.

programme.title: Whitetail Properties
programme.desc: It happens again in south central Kansas. Two giants hit the dirt during the early muzzleloader season. Further proving that Kansas holds and grows great whitetails. The challenge is, as always, the wicked western weather.

programme.title: Huntin' the Backwoods *
programme.desc: Dan and Troy return to Newfoundland Adventures for another spring bear hunt with Todd and Laura Wiseman. Troy is shocked as he encounters not one, but two three-legged bears on the island and Dan tags another dandy Newfoundland bear.

programme.title: North American Whitetail Television
programme.desc: Stan Potts bowhunts Illinois and doubles down in Montana with his rifle; Dr. Deer considers whether missing a buck will ruin a hunting spot; and we'll talk real-world archery practice.

programme.title: Outback Outdoors
programme.desc: Six-year-old Levi Ray gives us a sneak peak in what its like to see the outdoors through his eyes. His humorous and matter-of-fact way of looking at things brings a fresh perspective to hunting and fishing.

programme.title: Greg McHale's Wild Yukon
programme.desc: Greg treks and paddles a packraft deep into moose country for an incredible, late-season bowhunt.

programme.title: Under Wild Skies *
programme.desc: Tony and Professional Hunter Jacques Hartzenburg of Chapungu-Kambako Safaris head to familiar hunting grounds, the Timbavati Game Reserve in South Africa, to hunt Cape buffalo in the thick stuff. Tony takes a couple of nice bulls.

programme.title: Trijicon's World of Sports Afield
programme.sub-title: Feeding a Passion for Mule Deer
programme.desc: Tim Harold is in hot pursuit of mule deer. The rut is kicking in as Tim joins good friend Tom McReynolds in the great state of South Dakota. This area holds world-class mule deer, but the open country often makes closing the gap for a shot difficult.

programme.title: The Fierce Life *
programme.sub-title: Send It... Fierce Long Range Shooting School
programme.desc: Experience the annual Fierce Long Range Shooting School.

programme.title: RNT-V *
programme.desc: Jimbo, Blake, Jake and Charlee the duck dog head West to meet up with Ryan Livingston and Prairie Rock Outfitters for some epic Platte River waterfowling.

programme.title: Avian-X TV
programme.desc: Fred hunts late season mallards, the old fashioned way on the big water of Lake Erie with longtime friends, Jimmy Wren and Jeff Shelby.

programme.title: Bill Dance Saltwater
programme.desc: Bill Dance and Captain Josh Nelson fish the flat, shallow, emerald green waters of Crab Island by Destin, Fla. for some fighting redfish.

programme.title: Sweetwater
programme.desc: School is in session as Miles and Joey bring their better halves on a double date on the waters of Logan Martin Lake and pull in tons of bass.

programme.title: Respect the Game TV *
programme.desc: Paul and Ty Biggs have struggles and success in their home state of Oklahoma. Whitetail is in their blood.

programme.title: Jim Shockey's Hunting Adventures
programme.sub-title: The Outfit: Rogue River Outfitters - Part 2
programme.desc: Part 2. Team Shockey celebrates 25 years of outfitting.

programme.title: Out-There TV
programme.desc: Corey Brossman hunts the Midwest for giant whitetails during the opening week of the Illinois archery season. His young daughter flies into camp for a youth hunt filled with excitement.

programme.title: Hornady's Dark & Dangerous *
programme.sub-title: Safari in the Land of Legends
programme.desc: Experience the intense tracking of a wounded cape buffalo in the thick bush of the Zambezi Valley with PH Len Taylor. Also, we begin a safari with veteran PH and elephant expert Buzz Charlton for a legendary valley tusker.

programme.title: Backcountry Hunters TV
programme.desc: Hal Gahm and Todd McKinney team up with Joey Burns to hunt mule deer on one of the most unbelievable places in Colorado.

programme.title: Handguns And Defensive Weapons
programme.desc: Rich, Jim and Scott discuss handgun recoil and how it affects shooters, with tips on gear selection and shooting techniques. Rich and Scott discuss the merits of different targets, and Jim shows how to set up a simple drill with paper plates.

programme.title: Gallery of Guns
programme.desc: The Taurus TH9 compact and full-size in 9mm will be on display along with a precision rifle from Ruger and DiamondBack will show us an AR in 6.5 Grendel. We also have a Davidson's exclusive Ruger LCP Custom and a suppresser ready .22LR from Browning.

programme.title: All Things Hunting - ATH *
